title: ropsten network. The height is inconsistent with the browser
body:
Why my Latest Blocks  always lower than the one on the browser
my:
> eth.syncing
{
  currentBlock: 503348,
  highestBlock: 11218360,
  knownStates: 0,
  pulledStates: 0,
  startingBlock: 0
}

https://ropsten.etherscan.io/:
Latest Blocks: 11226112

version: geth-linux-amd64-1.10.8
It's because you are syncing. Looks like a full sync, still in the 500K range. You might want to consider doing a regular (snap) sync instead

> 那是因为你正在同步。看起来像完全同​​步，仍在 500K 范围内。您可能需要考虑进行常规（快照）同步

I'm afraid not

After synchronization is complete:

my: 
> eth.blockNumber
11219097
> eth.syncing
false

https://ropsten.etherscan.io/:
Latest Blocks: 11226607

The heights are different!!!!!!!
Could you provide a few hundred lines of log output from the geth process?

> 你能提供几百行 geth 进程的日志输出吗？

One thing that could cause this is if your machine does not have correct time. So if you're 8000 blocks behind, and the blocktime is `14s`, then you're essentially always 31 hours behind. Geth will not import a block unless it's at most `15m` into the future, so if the date on your computer is lagging behind by `31` hours, that would explain it. 

But OTOH, the timestamps from your logs doesn't look off. But please check it anyway.

> 可能导致这种情况的一件事是，如果您的机器没有正确的时间。因此，如果您落后 8000 个区块，而区块时间为`14s`，那么您基本上总是落后 31 小时。Geth 不会导入一个块，除非它最多是`15m`在未来，所以如果你计算机上的日期滞后`31`几个小时，那就可以解释了。
> 
> 但是 OTOH，您日志中的时间戳并没有消失。但无论如何请检查一下。

My server system time is east 8：
# date -R
Fri, 15 Oct 2021 18:58:06 +0800

Does anyone know what the problem is???
The current version is "geth-linux-amd64-1.10.10"
My start command is : 
/data/eth-ropsten/geth-linux-amd64-1.10.10-bb74230f/geth --http --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --ropsten --datadir /data/eth-ropsten/eth_data --cache=6096 --rpc.allow-unprotected-txs=true --http.port 8541 --port 30301 --ws --ws.addr 0.0.0.0 --ws.port 6667 --ws.origins * --http.api db,eth,net,web3,admin,miner,personal,rpc --http.corsdomain *

@Black52 I ran into a similar problem. Etherscan and what the geth client reported after syncing seemed to result in different top block heights. This is likely because Ropsten forked on block `10920274` and it is possible you ended up on the wrong fork, you can confirm which fork you are on by checking the hash of that block. The solution and correct hash is listed in https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/23503

> @Black52我遇到了类似的问题。Etherscan 和 geth 客户端在同步后报告的内容似乎导致不同的顶部块高度。这很可能是因为 Ropsten 在区块上分叉，`10920274`并且您最终可能在错误的分叉上，您可以通过检查该区块的哈希来确认您在哪个分叉上。解决方案和正确的哈希列在[#23503 中](https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/23503)

Thank you very much. That solved my problem
